enWisdom: A promise is an ailment and its cure is its fulfilment
The bane of covenants is lack of care [in fulfilling them]
The bane of loyalty is treachery

Wisdom: غَيْرُ مُوفٍ بِالْعُهُودِ مَنْ أَخْلَفَ الْوُعُودَ
enWisdom: He who breaks his promises is not loyal in his covenants
For every pledge that is broken there is uncertainty
One who breaks his pledge earns dispraise
One whose resolve [and intention] is evil, his death is a cause of happiness

Wisdom: مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَثِقُ بِكَ إِذَا غَدَرْتَ بِذَوِي رَحِمِكَ
enWisdom: Who will ever trust you when you are disloyal to your near relatives?
Betraying [one’s] agreements is one of the signs of vileness
From the most grievous forms of treachery is being treacherous with trusts or deposits [that one has been entrusted with]

Wisdom: مَا أَنْجَزَ الْوَعْدَ مَنْ مَطَلَ بِهِ
enWisdom: He who delays in fulfilling a promise has not kept it

Wisdom: مَا أَيْقَنَ بِاللَّهِ مَنْ لَمْ يَرْعَ عُهُودَهُ وَذِمَّتَهُ [ذِمَمَهُ‏]
enWisdom: He who does not observe his promises and agreements has no conviction in Allah
The promise of a wicked person is delayed and full of excuses
Never undo a knot that you are unable to firmly retie

Wisdom: لَا تَعِدَنَّ عِدَةً لَا تَثِقُ مِنْ نَفْسِكَ بِإِنْجَازِهَا
enWisdom: Never make a promise that you are not confident you will be able to keep
The treachery of a man is a disgrace upon him
